summary: new house with a new kinda gay follower a new spell and a new poison
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-6.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/65163-1-1430165203.png[/img]
High Sky House:

This is a house mod that adds a medium sized house, a new spell called Zeushand, two bottles of a new powerful poison and a follower named coco.

the house is located at the throat of the world it's right next to it so I didn’t make a map marker it's like right next to it but if you want one i can add a marker in the update.

The house has 4 epic costume music that I think everyone will enjoy. a lot of storage an enchanting and an alchemy table and a staff creating table. And as always a sky-forge and other thing you'll need for crafting.

You can find the spell book on the enchanting table and the 2 bottle of new poison next to the alchemy table.

you will need the dragonborn dlc and the latest skyrim update for it to run.

Thanks to Lame team : http://lame.sourceforge.net/ and Flac team : http://xiph.org/flac/ for
Their great conversion tool.

and the mod was supposed to be called zeushouse but when I finished it I was like it has nothing to do with Zeus so i changed the name you that’s why some files are called thing with Zeus in them.

As always leave any suggestion at the post section.
Ps:
I have already uploaded this mod before but I messed up and uploaded the wrong file I’m so sorry and I apologize to anyone who downloaded the first version of this house mod
author: Khashitk
